greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of Integral_{x=0..+oo} Polylog(-n, -x)^2 for n > 0, with a(0) = 1.
comment: These are the denominators of the Bernoulli median numbers (see A212196). - _Peter Luschny_, May 04 2012
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: max = 25; t[0] = Table[BernoulliB[n], {n, 0, 2*max}]; t[n_] := Differences[t[0], n]; a[n_] := t[n][[n + 1]] // Denominator; Table[a[n], {n, 0, max}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 25 2013, after _Peter Luschny_ *)
results.author: _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Jan 23 2011
ext: Offset set to 0, a(0) and a(19)..a(25) added by _Peter Luschny_, May 04 2012
